description: This file contains multiple recipe handler classes and functions used for build system detection and processing in a software build automation context, specifically within a recipe creation tool. It manages different build systems like CMake, Autotools, SCons, Qmake, and Makefile, providing mechanisms for parsing, dependency extraction, and recipe generation.

classes.name: CmakeRecipeHandler
classes.description: Handles detection and processing of CMake build system files (CMakeLists.txt) within recipes, extracts dependencies, and modifies build instructions.

classes.name: SconsRecipeHandler
classes.description: Handles SCons build system files, adding appropriate build system handlers.

classes.name: QmakeRecipeHandler
classes.description: Handles Qmake project files (*.pro), integrating Qmake into the recipe processing pipeline.

classes.name: AutotoolsRecipeHandler
classes.description: Processes Autotools build system files, extracting dependencies and configuring build instructions.

classes.name: MakefileRecipeHandler
classes.description: Handles Makefiles, especially for recipes that rely solely on Makefile-based build processes.

classes.name: VersionFileRecipeHandler
classes.description: Detects version information from VERSION or version files to set PV (version) in recipes.

classes.name: SpecFileRecipeHandler
classes.description: Parses RPM spec files to extract metadata such as name, version, license, and other properties for recipe generation.

classes.name: AutotoolsExtensionHandler
classes.description: Base class for extending Autotools macro processing within recipes.

classes.name: CmakeExtensionHandler
classes.description: Base class for extending CMake macro processing within recipes.

methods.name: register_recipe_handlers(handlers)
methods.description: Registers all the defined recipe handlers into the handlers list.

methods.name: post_process(self, srctree, fn, pkg, deps, outlines, inherits, values)
process(self, srctree, classes, lines_before, lines_after, handled, extravalues)
process_findpackage(self, srctree, fn, pkg, deps, outlines, inherits, values)
process_line(self, srctree, fn, line, libdeps, pcdeps, deps, outlines, inherits, values)
process_macro(self, srctree, keyword, value, process_value, libdeps, pcdeps, deps, outlines, inherits, values)
process_prog(self, srctree, keyword, value, prog, deps, outlines, inherits, values)
